abstract.t: This document presents a survey of popular Peer-to-Peer streamingapplications on the Internet. We focus on the Architecture and PeerProtocol/Tracker Signaling Protocol description in the presentation,and study a selection of well-known P2P streaming systems, includingJoost, PPlive, andother popular existing systems. Through thesurvey, we summarize a common P2P streaming process model and thecorrespondent signaling process for P2P Streaming Protocolstandardization.
